CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper May 11, 1957, pg. 3, reads: "Hoping and Praying - Mrs. Raymond Lawson and four-year-old Raymond Keith and two-year-old Deborah are hoping and praying that the head of the household will return home soon. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Family of murder suspect Raymond Lawson, Raymond Keith Lawson, Mrs. Lawson, and Deborah Lawson posed in hallway of Allegheny County Courthouse, Downtown
